snippet: Darrell Dula, who had charges against him in a case involving a young Orthodox Jewish woman dismissed, claims malicious prosecution and false imprisonment.
abstract: Darrell Dula, who was jailed for 10 months on a rape charged that was dismissed, is suing New York City and the Brooklyn district attorney's officer for malicious prosecution, defamation and false imprisonment.
lead_paragraph: Darrell Dula, who had charges against him in a case involving a young Orthodox Jewish woman dismissed, claims malicious prosecution and false imprisonment.

headline.seo: Defendant Sues Hynes After Orthodox Woman Recants Rape Claim
headline.main: Ex-Defendant Sues Prosecutor After Rape Charge Is Dropped
headline.print_headline: Ex-Defendant Sues Prosecutor After Rape Charge Is Dropped
